metadata.title: CVE-2019-10214 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
The containers/image library used by the container tools Podman, Buildah,and Skopeo in Red Hat Enterprise Linux version 8 and CRI-O in OpenShiftContainer Platform, does not enforce TLS connections to the containerregistry authorization service. An attacker could use this vulnerability tolaunch a MiTM attack and steal login credentials or bearer tokens.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10214` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

singularity-container - 4.1.2+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-github-containers-image package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
singularity-container package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.2+ds1-1').
